analyzed: dge slong 'char ka 'dis che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyis lags te /
translated: This monk Udayī has completed the six-day trial period for that saṃghāvaśeṣa offense that arose from such-and-such.

original: dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol na /
analyzed: dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol na /
translated: He has asked the Saṅgha to end his probation.

original: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyis pa dbyung bar mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyis pa dbyung bar mdzad nas /
translated: For that purpose the Saṅgha will end the probation of the monk Udāyī for the offense of a serious violation that he’s admitted.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'char ka che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyis pa dbyung bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shing //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'char ka che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyis pa dbyung bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shing //
translated: Any of you who approve of ending the probation of the monk Udāyī for the offense of a serious violation that he’s admitted should remain silent.🔽Any who do not approve should speak up.

original: gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste /
analyzed: gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste /
translated: This is the first announcement.🔽And a second time it should be announced.

original: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
analyzed: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
translated: And a third time it should be announced.

original: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas /
translated: The Saṅgha has ended the probation of the monk Udāyī for the offense of a serious violation that he’s admitted.

original: dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyis pa phyung lags te /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyis pa phyung lags te /
translated: The Saṅgha has performed the act of reconciliation for the monk Upasena, who committed a downfall involving expulsion, for six days.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
translated: Since the Saṅgha has not raised any objections, this matter is settled.

original: de ni las brjod pa dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa bya ba'i cho ga dang sngags so //
analyzed: de ni las brjod pa dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa bya ba'i cho ga dang sngags so //
translated: This is the ritual and the formula for the first, second, and third actions, together with the concluding action.

original: de'i 'og tu gzengs bstod pa'i cho ga dang sngags ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gzengs bstod pa'i cho ga dang sngags ni 'di yin te /
translated: After that, the ritual and the formula for the praise are as follows.

original: dge slong las byed pa de nyid kyis de'i mod la dge 'dun gyi dbus su gang zag de thal mo sbyar te tsog pur 'dug tu bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //🔽'char ka khyod kyis legs pa byas so //
analyzed: dge slong las byed pa de nyid kyis de'i mod la dge 'dun gyi dbus su gang zag de thal mo sbyar te tsog pur 'dug tu bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o // 'char ka khyod kyis legs pa byas so //
translated: The same monk official should immediately have the person in the middle of the Saṅgha put his palms together and sit down. He should say this:🔽“Upasena, you have done well.

original: legs pa shin tu byas so //
analyzed: legs pa shin tu byas so //
translated: You have done extremely well.

original: gnyis ni mkhas pa /
analyzed: gnyis ni mkhas pa /
translated: Two are wise.

original: gnyis ni gsal ba /🔽gnyis ni dge ba /
analyzed: gnyis ni gsal ba / gnyis ni dge ba /
translated: Two are clear.🔽Two are virtuous.

original: gnyis ni skyes bu dam pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis ni skyes bu dam pa ste /
translated: Two are holy beings.

original: gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: What are the two?🔽They are not committing a downfall and, if one does commit a downfall,

original: ltung ba mi 'byin pa gang yin pa dang / ltung ba byung nas chos bzhin du @170b phyir bcos pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: ltung ba mi 'byin pa gang yin pa dang / ltung ba byung nas chos bzhin du @170b phyir bcos pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: restoring it through the Dharma.

original: gnyis ni sdig pa'i rtsa ba rko ba /
analyzed: gnyis ni sdig pa'i rtsa ba rko ba /
translated: The two are uprooting the basis of evil,

original: rgyun las bzlog pa la 'bad pa /
analyzed: rgyun las bzlog pa la 'bad pa /
translated: striving to reverse the current,

original: 'bab chu dang 'khri shing skems pa /🔽bdud 'dul ba /
analyzed: 'bab chu dang 'khri shing skems pa / bdud 'dul ba /
translated: drying up the waterfall and the vines,🔽taming Mara,

original: bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol ba /
analyzed: bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol ba /
translated: lowering Mara’s banner,

original: chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba /
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba /
translated: raising the banner of the Dharma,

original: sdig pa'i rgyun gcod pa /
analyzed: sdig pa'i rgyun gcod pa /
translated: cutting the stream of evil,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang mthun par bskor ba rjes su bskor ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang mthun par bskor ba rjes su bskor ba ste /
translated: and turning the wheel of Dharma in accordance with the Dharma of the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One.

original: gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: What are the two?🔽They are not committing a downfall and, if one does commit a downfall,

original: ltung ba mi 'byin pa gang yin pa dang / ltung ba byung nas chos bzhin du phyir 'chos pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: ltung ba mi 'byin pa gang yin pa dang / ltung ba byung nas chos bzhin du phyir 'chos pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: restoring it through the Dharma.

original: gnyis ni rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhing kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis kyis zag pa 'phel bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnyis ni rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhing kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis kyis zag pa 'phel bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Two do not increase the outflows.

original: gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: What are the two?

original: ltung ba mi 'byin pa gang yin pa dang / ltung ba byung nas chos bzhin du phyir 'chos pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: ltung ba mi 'byin pa gang yin pa dang / ltung ba byung nas chos bzhin du phyir 'chos pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The one who does not commit a downfall and the one who, having committed a downfall, restores it in accordance with the teaching.

original: 'char ka khyod ltung ba 'di bshags shing so sor bshags pas /
analyzed: 'char ka khyod ltung ba 'di bshags shing so sor bshags pas /
translated: Udayi, you have confessed this downfall and have confessed it individually.

original: mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal bal bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal bal bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /
translated: You have the perception of impermanence, the perception of suffering in impermanence, the perception of no self in suffering, the perception of unattractiveness in food, the perception of discontent with the whole world,

original: nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes dang / spong ba'i 'du shes dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang / 'gog pa'i 'du shes dang / 'chi ba'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bsngos pa'i 'du shes dang /🔽rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /
analyzed: nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes dang / spong ba'i 'du shes dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang / 'gog pa'i 'du shes dang / 'chi ba'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bsngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /
translated: the perception of the drawbacks, the perception of giving up, the perception of being free from attachment, the perception of cessation, the perception of death, the perception of the unattractive, the perception of a bloated corpse,

original: rus gong gi 'du shes dang / stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i 'du shes kyi 'os su gyur pa yin /
analyzed: rus gong gi 'du shes dang / stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i 'du shes kyi 'os su gyur pa yin /
translated: the perception of a livid corpse, the perception of a festering corpse, the perception of a fissured corpse, the perception of a corpse gnawed by animals, the perception of a corpse that has become a skeleton, the perception of a corpse that has been burned, the perception of a corpse that has decomposed, the perception of a corpse that has been cut up, the perception of a corpse that has been washed, the perception of a corpse without skin, the perception of a corpse without flesh, the perception of a skeleton, and the perception of emptiness.🔽“

original: bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
translated: love,🔽compassion,🔽joy,🔽equanimity,🔽the sphere of infinite space,🔽the sphere of infinite consciousness,🔽the sphere of nothingness,🔽the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception,🔽the fruit of stream-entry,🔽the fruit of once-returning,

original: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / @171a * //
analyzed: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / @171a * //
translated: the fruit of non-returning,🔽the sphere of the miraculous,🔽the divine ear,🔽the knowledge of others' minds,🔽recollection of past lives,🔽death and rebirth,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang / lha'i rna ba dang / sems kyi rnam grangs dang / sngon gyi gnas dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang / 'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa'i 'os su gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang / lha'i rna ba dang / sems kyi rnam grangs dang / sngon gyi gnas dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang / 'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa'i 'os su gyur pa yin no //
translated: and the supreme fruit of arhatship.

original: 'char ka ltung ba 'di bshags shing so sor bshags pas 'gro ba gnyis po las gang yang rung ba zhig khyod kyi 'gro ba yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'char ka ltung ba 'di bshags shing so sor bshags pas 'gro ba gnyis po las gang yang rung ba zhig khyod kyi 'gro ba yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: The Blessed One said, Udayi, by confessing and purifying this downfall, you should know that you have one of two destinies.

original: lha dang mi'o //
analyzed: lha dang mi'o //
translated: The gods and humans.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang las kyi mtha' mi 'chab pa'i 'gro ba ni gnyis te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang las kyi mtha' mi 'chab pa'i 'gro ba ni gnyis te /
translated: The Blessed One also said, The destinies of those who do not conceal their actions are two.

original: lha dang mi'o //
analyzed: lha dang mi'o //
translated: The gods and humans.

original: gang dag ngas bshad pa la yid ches pa de dag ni 'chab par mi sems so zhes gsungs so //🔽yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang dag ngas bshad pa la yid ches pa de dag ni 'chab par mi sems so zhes gsungs so // yang gsungs pa /
translated: Those who have confidence in my teaching do not think to conceal their actions.

original: bcabs pa char pa bzhin du bab //
analyzed: bcabs pa char pa bzhin du bab //
translated: The Blessed One also said, Concealment falls like rain.

original: bshags pa char bzhin bab mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bshags pa char bzhin bab mi 'gyur //
translated: Confession does not fall like rain.

original: de lta bas na bshags par bya //
analyzed: de lta bas na bshags par bya //
translated: Therefore, confess.

original: de ltar char bzhin mi 'bab ce'o //
analyzed: de ltar char bzhin mi 'bab ce'o //
translated: Confession does not fall like rain.🔽The Blessed One said, Venerable Udayi, you have been expelled. Practice carefully!

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka khyod phyung zin gyis bag yod par sgrubs shig / de ni gzengs bstod pa'i cho ga dang sngags te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka khyod phyung zin gyis bag yod par sgrubs shig / de ni gzengs bstod pa'i cho ga dang sngags te /
translated: This is the rite and mantra for encouraging him.

original: de tsam gyis na de dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las byung bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de tsam gyis na de dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las byung bar rig par bya'o //
translated: By this much, you should know that he has emerged from the offense of a monk who is suspended.

original: da ni 'dul ba'i gzhi bsdu ba'i khyad par cung zhig bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni 'dul ba'i gzhi bsdu ba'i khyad par cung zhig bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, I will explain a little of the special topics of the Vinaya.

original: spo ba zhes bya ba'i khyad par ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: spo ba zhes bya ba'i khyad par ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: The special topic called “banishment” is of three types:

original: spo ba dang / gzhi nas spo ba dang / yang gzhi nas blang ste spo ba'o //
analyzed: spo ba dang / gzhi nas spo ba dang / yang gzhi nas blang ste spo ba'o //
translated: banishment, banishment from the beginning, and banishment after taking it up again from the beginning.

original: mgu bar bya ba zhes bya ba'i khyad par yang rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: mgu bar bya ba zhes bya ba'i khyad par yang rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: The special topic called “satisfaction” is also of three types:

original: mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba'o //
translated: satisfaction, satisfaction from the beginning, and satisfaction after taking it up again from the beginning.

original: de la spo ba zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la /
analyzed: de la spo ba zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la /
translated: Regarding that, banishment is when a pārājika offense has occurred.

original: ji srid du bcabs pa'i dus de srid dus gzhan na gnas pa'i spyod pas spo ba byed du gzhug pa ji skad sngar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ji srid du bcabs pa'i dus de srid dus gzhan na gnas pa'i spyod pas spo ba byed du gzhug pa ji skad sngar bstan pa'o //
translated: For as long as the time of concealment, one should be made to live by the practice of banishment, as previously explained.

original: gzhi nas spo ba byed pa nyid ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rigs mthun pa yang byung na /
analyzed: gzhi nas spo ba byed pa nyid ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rigs mthun pa yang byung na /
translated: Banishment from the beginning is when a similar type of pārājika offense occurs.

original: spo ba snga ma mnos te byas pa de zhig pas de'i phyir yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba gdod brtsam pa'o //
analyzed: spo ba snga ma mnos te byas pa de zhig pas de'i phyir yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba gdod brtsam pa'o //
translated: Since the former probation was broken, he must begin the probation anew, having been re-admitted to the order.

original: yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba zhes bya ba ni gzhi nas spo ba byed pa nyid na dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rigs mthun pa yang byung na /
analyzed: yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba zhes bya ba ni gzhi nas spo ba byed pa nyid na dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rigs mthun pa yang byung na /
translated: The term probation anew means that when one is undergoing probation anew, if a similar offense of a partially concordant type occurs,

original: spo ba dang gzhi nas spo ba snga ma mnos te byas pa de nyid zhig pas de'i phyir yang gzhi nas bslad ste spo ba gdod brtsam pa'o //
analyzed: spo ba dang gzhi nas spo ba snga ma mnos te byas pa de nyid zhig pas de'i phyir yang gzhi nas bslad ste spo ba gdod brtsam pa'o //
translated: since the former probation and probation anew were broken, he must begin the probation anew, having been re-admitted to the order.

original: mgu bar bya ba zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las dbyung ba'i phyir @171b zhag drug gi bar du sa gzhan na gnas pa'i spyod pas mgu bar bya ba spyad pa ji skad sngar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mgu bar bya ba zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las dbyung ba'i phyir @171b zhag drug gi bar du sa gzhan na gnas pa'i spyod pas mgu bar bya ba spyad pa ji skad sngar bstan pa'o //
translated: The term to please means to practice the conduct of living in another place for six days in order to be released from the offense of a partially concordant type, as previously explained.

original: gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba zhes bya ba ni mgu par bya ba byed pa nyid ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rigs mthun pa yang byung na mgu bar bya ba snga ma mnos te byas pa de zhig pas de'i phyir gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba🔽gdod brtsam pa'o //
analyzed: gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba zhes bya ba ni mgu par bya ba byed pa nyid ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rigs mthun pa yang byung na mgu bar bya ba snga ma mnos te byas pa de zhig pas de'i phyir gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba gdod brtsam pa'o //
translated: “One should begin again” means that if one who is undertaking the process of pleasing the saṅgha incurs a corresponding offense entailing suspension, then the previous process of pleasing the saṅgha is broken. Therefore, one should begin again.

original: yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba zhes bya ba ni gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba byed pa nyid na dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rigs mthun pa yang byung na mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba snga ma mnos te byas pa de gnyis zhig pas de'i phyir yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba gdod brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba zhes bya ba ni gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba byed pa nyid na dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rigs mthun pa yang byung na mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba snga ma mnos te byas pa de gnyis zhig pas de'i phyir yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba gdod brtsams pa'o //
translated: “One should begin again and then please” means that if one who is undertaking the process of pleasing the saṅgha incurs a corresponding offense entailing suspension, then both the process of pleasing the saṅgha and the process of beginning again are broken. Therefore, one should begin again and then please.

original: de dag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rigs mthun par byung bas de ltar 'gyur gyi rigs mi mthun pas ni de ltar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rigs mthun par byung bas de ltar 'gyur gyi rigs mi mthun pas ni de ltar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: These processes apply when one incurs a corresponding offense entailing suspension, but not when one incurs a different kind of offense.

original: de dag las spo ba spyin pa'i tshigs la mgu gsum yod de /
analyzed: de dag las spo ba spyin pa'i tshigs la mgu gsum yod de /
translated: There are three types of probationary bhikṣus:

original: spo ba sbyin pa dang / gzhi nas spo ba sbyin pa dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: spo ba sbyin pa dang / gzhi nas spo ba sbyin pa dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba sbyin pa'o //
translated: probationary bhikṣus, probationary bhikṣus from the beginning, and probationary bhikṣus who are raised from the beginning.

original: mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa'i tshigs la mu bcu gnyis yod de /🔽mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa gsum dang / spo ba byas pa la mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang / spo ba byas pa la gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang /
analyzed: mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa'i tshigs la mu bcu gnyis yod de / mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa gsum dang / spo ba byas pa la mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang / spo ba byas pa la gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang /
translated: There are twelve types of those who are to be made content:🔽those who are to be made content, those who are to be made content from the beginning, and those who are to be made content who are raised from the beginning,🔽those who are to be made content who are probationary bhikṣus, those who are to be made content who are probationary bhikṣus from the beginning,

original: spo ba byas pa la yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa gsum dang / gzhi nas spo ba byas pa la mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang / gzhi nas spo ba byas pa la gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang /
analyzed: spo ba byas pa la yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa gsum dang / gzhi nas spo ba byas pa la mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang / gzhi nas spo ba byas pa la gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang /
translated: and those who are to be made content who are probationary bhikṣus who are raised from the beginning, those who are to be made content who are probationary bhikṣus from the beginning, those who are to be made content who are probationary bhikṣus from the beginning,🔽and those who are to be made content who are probationary bhikṣus who are raised from the beginning.

original: gzhi nas spo ba byas pa la yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa gsum dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba byas pa la mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba byas pa la gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang /🔽yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba byas pa la yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa gsum ste bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: gzhi nas spo ba byas pa la yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa gsum dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba byas pa la mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba byas pa la gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba byas pa la yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa gsum ste bcu gnyis so //
translated: There are three gifts of probation after the first transgression, banishment, and probation: the gift of probation after the first transgression, banishment, and probation, the gift of probation after the first transgression, banishment, and probation, and the gift of probation after the first transgression, banishment, and probation.🔽Thus there are twelve.

original: de dag sbyin pa'i rim pa yang dang por bdag gis lan gsum gsol ba dang / de nas dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis sbyin pa dang / byin nas sa gzhan na gnas pa'i spyod pa kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas @172a * //
analyzed: de dag sbyin pa'i rim pa yang dang por bdag gis lan gsum gsol ba dang / de nas dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis sbyin pa dang / byin nas sa gzhan na gnas pa'i spyod pa kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas @172a * //
translated: The stages of giving are as follows: First, one requests the saṅgha three times, then the saṅgha gives the gift through a ceremony consisting of four proclamations.

original: par spyad cing nyin re lan re'am nyi ma gsum mam bzhi zhing dge 'dun nam gang zag la nyi ma thal ba dang / 'byung ba brjod pa dang / dgra bo'ong na phyir btang la dgra bo song na phyir blang ba'i cho ga dang rim pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: par spyad cing nyin re lan re'am nyi ma gsum mam bzhi zhing dge 'dun nam gang zag la nyi ma thal ba dang / 'byung ba brjod pa dang / dgra bo'ong na phyir btang la dgra bo song na phyir blang ba'i cho ga dang rim pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The ritual and procedure for the probation for one day, for the declaration of the elements, and for the sending back of an enemy, is the same as before.

original: sngags kyi tshig la ni bye brag yod de ;
analyzed: sngags kyi tshig la ni bye brag yod de ;
translated: There is a difference in the words of the mantra.

original: kha cig ni 'dul ba'i gzhi dang / las brgya rtsa gcig pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin dngos su sbyar ro //
analyzed: kha cig ni 'dul ba'i gzhi dang / las brgya rtsa gcig pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin dngos su sbyar ro //
translated: Some apply it literally, as in the Basic Section on the Monastic Code and in the One Hundred and One Rituals.

original: kha cig ni 'khor lo bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: kha cig ni 'khor lo bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: Some apply it as if it were a wheel.

original: dbyung ba sbyin pa'i tshigs la yang mu bcu gnyis yod de /
analyzed: dbyung ba sbyin pa'i tshigs la yang mu bcu gnyis yod de /
translated: There are twelve alternatives for the words of the gift of probation.

original: mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba gsum dang / spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang /
analyzed: mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba gsum dang / spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang /
translated: There are three alternatives for the probation for one day: the probation for one day for one who has practiced the pleasing act, the probation for one day for one who has practiced the pleasing act from the beginning, and the probation for one day for one who has practiced the pleasing act after being lifted from the beginning.

original: spo ba dang gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang / spo ba dang yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba gsum dang / gzhi nas spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang /
analyzed: spo ba dang gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang / spo ba dang yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba gsum dang / gzhi nas spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang /
translated: There are three that are the opposite:🔽the actual practice of pleasing after being restored,🔽the actual practice of pleasing after being restored and being restored again,

original: gzhi nas spo ba dang gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang / gzhi nas spo ba dang yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba gsum dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang /
analyzed: gzhi nas spo ba dang gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang / gzhi nas spo ba dang yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba gsum dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang /
translated: and the actual practice of pleasing after being restored again and again.🔽There are three that are the opposite:🔽the trial period and the actual practice of pleasing after being restored,

original: yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba dang gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba dang yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba gsum ste bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba dang gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba dang yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dbyung ba gsum ste bcu gnyis so //
translated: the trial period and the actual practice of pleasing after being restored again,🔽and the trial period and the actual practice of pleasing after being restored again and again.

original: de dag sbyin pa'i rim pa yang dang por bdag gis lan gsum dbyung ba gsol ba dang / de nas dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsdigs pa dang / gzengs bstod pa dang bcas pas dbyung ba'i cho ga dang rim pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de dag sbyin pa'i rim pa yang dang por bdag gis lan gsum dbyung ba gsol ba dang / de nas dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsdigs pa dang / gzengs bstod pa dang bcas pas dbyung ba'i cho ga dang rim pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Then, the saṅgha requests the rite of the ceremony of confession and the rite of the ceremony of reinstatement through the rite of the four requests.

original: sngags kyi tshig la ni bye brag yong de /
analyzed: sngags kyi tshig la ni bye brag yong de /
translated: The words of the mantra are different.

original: kha cig ni 'dul ba'i gzhi dang las brgya rtsa gcig pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin dngos su sbyar ro //
analyzed: kha cig ni 'dul ba'i gzhi dang las brgya rtsa gcig pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin dngos su sbyar ro //
translated: Some are applied directly, as they appear in the One Hundred and Ten Formal Procedures for Confession.

original: kha cig ni 'khor lo bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: kha cig ni 'khor lo bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: Some are applied in the manner of a wheel.

original: gzhi nas spo ba dang yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba sbyin pa'i tshigs 'di gnyis la ni ltung ba phyis byung ba de bcabs pa'i dus lhag pa der gzhug dgos la /
analyzed: gzhi nas spo ba dang yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba sbyin pa'i tshigs 'di gnyis la ni ltung ba phyis byung ba de bcabs pa'i dus lhag pa der gzhug dgos la /
translated: In the two lines “I grant the trial period from the beginning and the lifting of the restrictions from the beginning,” the period of concealment of the later downfalls must be added to the period of concealment of the earlier downfalls.

original: dus mnyam pa dang nyung ba ni der gzhug mi dgos te /
analyzed: dus mnyam pa dang nyung ba ni der gzhug mi dgos te /
translated: If the periods are the same or less, they need not be added.

original: des gang la ltung ba snga ma bcabs @172b pa'i dus zla ba phyed yod la /
analyzed: des gang la ltung ba snga ma bcabs @172b pa'i dus zla ba phyed yod la /
translated: If the earlier downfalls were concealed for a half month,

original: ltung ba phyi ma bcabs pa'i dus kyang zla ba phyed dam de bas nyung ba yod pa de la ni /
analyzed: ltung ba phyi ma bcabs pa'i dus kyang zla ba phyed dam de bas nyung ba yod pa de la ni /
translated: Also, the time of confessing the latter downfalls is half a month or less than that.

original: mthol ba dang gzhi nas spo ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba gsol ba dang / sbyin pa'i sngags kyi tshig tu yang zla ba phyed khon smos la /
analyzed: mthol ba dang gzhi nas spo ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba gsol ba dang / sbyin pa'i sngags kyi tshig tu yang zla ba phyed khon smos la /
translated: In the words of the mantra for giving the trial period, only half a month is mentioned,

original: gzhi nas spo ba dang yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba yang zla ba phyed kho na sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhi nas spo ba dang yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba yang zla ba phyed kho na sbyin par bya'o //
translated: and the trial period is given for only half a month.

original: gang la ltung ba snga ma bcabs pa'i dus zla ba phyed yod la /
analyzed: gang la ltung ba snga ma bcabs pa'i dus zla ba phyed yod la /
translated: If the time of confessing the former downfalls is half a month,

original: ltung ba phyi ma bcabs pa'i dus zla ba gcig yod pa de la ni mthol ba dang / gzhi nas spo ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba gsol ba dang / sbyin pa'i sngags kyi tshig tu yang zla ba gcig smos la /
analyzed: ltung ba phyi ma bcabs pa'i dus zla ba gcig yod pa de la ni mthol ba dang / gzhi nas spo ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba gsol ba dang / sbyin pa'i sngags kyi tshig tu yang zla ba gcig smos la /
translated: and the time of confessing the latter downfalls is one month, then in the words of the mantra for giving the trial period, one month is mentioned,

original: gzhi nas spo ba dang yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba yang zla ba gcig sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhi nas spo ba dang yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba yang zla ba gcig sbyin par bya ste /
translated: and the trial period is given for one month.

original: des ltung ba snga ma zla ba phyed bcabs pa dang / ltung ba phyi ma bcabs pa'i nyes pa gnyis ka med par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: des ltung ba snga ma zla ba phyed bcabs pa dang / ltung ba phyi ma bcabs pa'i nyes pa gnyis ka med par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the former downfall is not concealed for half a month and that the latter downfall is not concealed for the time it was concealed.

original: ltung ba phyi ma bcabs pa'i dus lhag ma gnas skabs gang la srid ce na /🔽spo ba spyod bzhin pa nyid na ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung la de'i mod la spo ba spyod pa mthar thug pa'i dus dang / de bas 'phyi ba'i dus gzhan du yang ltung ba bar mthol ba'i gnas skabs dang / spo ba'am gzhi nas spo ba bas ltung ba rigs mthun pa byung nas 'thab krol byed pa 'ong ba'i tshe phyir spo ba la sogs ba btang ste /
analyzed: ltung ba phyi ma bcabs pa'i dus lhag ma gnas skabs gang la srid ce na / spo ba spyod bzhin pa nyid na ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung la de'i mod la spo ba spyod pa mthar thug pa'i dus dang / de bas 'phyi ba'i dus gzhan du yang ltung ba bar mthol ba'i gnas skabs dang / spo ba'am gzhi nas spo ba bas ltung ba rigs mthun pa byung nas 'thab krol byed pa 'ong ba'i tshe phyir spo ba la sogs ba btang ste /
translated: When is the time of concealing the latter downfall?

original: yang phyir len pa des btang ba'i gnas skabs su ltung ba bar ma dang phyi ma ma mthol bar bcabs pa'i dus ches ring du sgrub pa'i gnas skabs la srid do //
analyzed: yang phyir len pa des btang ba'i gnas skabs su ltung ba bar ma dang phyi ma ma mthol bar bcabs pa'i dus ches ring du sgrub pa'i gnas skabs la srid do //
translated: When one is in the process of demotion, a downfall similar to the former one occurs and is not confessed immediately, or at the time of completing the demotion, or at another time after that, or when a middle or a later downfall occurs and is not confessed, or when one is demoted and then a downfall of the same type occurs and one engages in disputation, or when one is demoted again and so on, and the time of the middle and later downfalls that are not confessed is established as very long.

original: spo pa sbyin pa dang / gzhi nas spo ba sbyin pa dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba sbyin pa'i mu 'di gsum la bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes pa dang / ltung ba'i grangs nges par mi shes pa dang / ltung ba mang po byung ba la spo ba la sogs pa sbyin pa'i cho ga dang sngags ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: spo pa sbyin pa dang / gzhi nas spo ba sbyin pa dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba sbyin pa'i mu 'di gsum la bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes pa dang / ltung ba'i grangs nges par mi shes pa dang / ltung ba mang po byung ba la spo ba la sogs pa sbyin pa'i cho ga dang sngags ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: There are three possibilities for the rite of demotion: the rite of demotion for concealing the downfall, the rite of demotion for not recognizing the downfall, and the rite of demotion for not recognizing the number of downfalls.

original: bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes na bcabs pa'i phyir ni dus dpag tu med pa la brten par bya /
analyzed: bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes na bcabs pa'i phyir ni dus dpag tu med pa la brten par bya /
translated: If the time of concealment is not certain, the penance should be based on an indefinite period of time.

original: spo ba spyad pa'i phyir ni dag pa'i mtha' can zla ba bzhi la sogs pa la brten par bya ste /
analyzed: spo ba spyad pa'i phyir ni dag pa'i mtha' can zla ba bzhi la sogs pa la brten par bya ste /
translated: If the penance is to be served, it should be based on a definite period of time, such as four months.

original: des na spo ba la sogs pa gsol ba dang / sbyin pa dang / brjod pa dang gtong ba dang len pa'i sngags kyi tshig la 'di skad ces @173a * //
analyzed: des na spo ba la sogs pa gsol ba dang / sbyin pa dang / brjod pa dang gtong ba dang len pa'i sngags kyi tshig la 'di skad ces @173a * //
translated: The following is the mantra for requesting the rite of demotion, for giving consent to it, for announcing it, for relinquishing the rite, and for accepting it.

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Venerable monks, please listen.

original: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la dpag tu ma mchis par bcabs pas bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba🔽byung la / dpag tu ma mchis par bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun las dag pa'i mtha' can zla ba bzhi spo ba gsol na /
analyzed: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la dpag tu ma mchis par bcabs pas bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la / dpag tu ma mchis par bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun las dag pa'i mtha' can zla ba bzhi spo ba gsol na /
translated: I, the monk so-and-so, have committed an offense entailing suspension that has occurred in such-and-such place. Since I have concealed it for an unmeasured length of time, I, the monk so-and-so, have committed an offense entailing suspension that has occurred in such-and-such place.🔽Since I have concealed it for an unmeasured length of time, I request that the saṅgha grant me probation for four months, the limit of purity.

original: thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba dpag tu ma mchis par bcabs pa de'i slad du dag pa'i mtha'🔽can zla ba bzhi spo ba stsal du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba dpag tu ma mchis par bcabs pa de'i slad du dag pa'i mtha'🔽can zla ba bzhi spo ba stsal du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, Venerable sirs of the saṅgha, please grant me, the monk so-and-so, probation for four months, the limit of purity, for the sake of compassion.

original: de la bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes pa'i phyir dpag tu med par bcabs zhes smos pas ni bcabs pa'i dus nyung ngur mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes pa'i phyir dpag tu med par bcabs zhes smos pas ni bcabs pa'i dus nyung ngur mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since the time of concealment is not definitely known, it is said that concealment is immeasurable, and thus the time of concealment does not become small.

original: spo ba spyod pa'i phyir dag pa'i mtha' can zla ba bzhi smos pas ni spyad pa'i dus nyung dur mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: spo ba spyod pa'i phyir dag pa'i mtha' can zla ba bzhi smos pas ni spyad pa'i dus nyung dur mi 'gyur te /
translated: Since the four months of probation are said to end with purification, the time of probation does not become small.

original: dge ba'i mtha' can zhes bya ba ni sngon ltung ba ma byung ba dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa rang gis dran pa tshun chad nas ltung ba mthol ba'i bar ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i mtha' can zhes bya ba ni sngon ltung ba ma byung ba dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa rang gis dran pa tshun chad nas ltung ba mthol ba'i bar ro //
translated: The end of virtue refers to the time of purification when downfalls have not previously occurred, from the time one remembers up to the point of confessing downfalls.

original: zla ba bzhi zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: zla ba bzhi zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa ste /
translated: The term four months is an illustration.

original: zla ba phyed dam gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi'am lnga la sogs pa dang po dag pa'i mtha' nas bzung ste /
analyzed: zla ba phyed dam gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi'am lnga la sogs pa dang po dag pa'i mtha' nas bzung ste /
translated: It refers to half a month, one month, two months, three months, four months, five months and so on.

original: ji tsam gyis na bcabs pa'i dus mi dran pa de nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba de tsam gyi dus la brten na spo ba spyod pa'i dus tshang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji tsam gyis na bcabs pa'i dus mi dran pa de nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba de tsam gyi dus la brten na spo ba spyod pa'i dus tshang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one relies on the time from the beginning of purification up to the time when one does not remember the time of concealment, the time of probation is complete.

original: ltung ba'i grangs nges par mi shes na ltung ba'i phyir yang dpag tu med pa la brten par bya /
analyzed: ltung ba'i grangs nges par mi shes na ltung ba'i phyir yang dpag tu med pa la brten par bya /
translated: If one does not know the number of downfalls, one should rely on the incalculable.

original: bcabs pa'i dus nges par shes na ni spo ba spyad pa'i phyir ni dus zla ba phyed la sogs pa nges pa la brten par bya /
analyzed: bcabs pa'i dus nges par shes na ni spo ba spyad pa'i phyir ni dus zla ba phyed la sogs pa nges pa la brten par bya /
translated: If one knows the time of concealment, one should rely on the definite time of half a month and so on in order to practice probation.

original: bcabs pa'i dus kyang nges par ma shes na ni dpag tu med pa dang dag pa'i mtha' can zla ba bzhi la brten par bya ste /
analyzed: bcabs pa'i dus kyang nges par ma shes na ni dpag tu med pa dang dag pa'i mtha' can zla ba bzhi la brten par bya ste /
translated: If one does not know the time of concealment, one should rely on the incalculable and the four months with a pure end.

original: des na spo ba la sogs pa gsol ba dang / sbyin pa dang brjod pa dang / gtong ba dang len pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di skad ces /
analyzed: des na spo ba la sogs pa gsol ba dang / sbyin pa dang brjod pa dang / gtong ba dang len pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di skad ces /
translated: Therefore, the words of the mantra for requesting, giving, reciting, relinquishing, and accepting probation and so on are as follows:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Virtuous Saṅgha, please listen!

original: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun @173b lhag ma'i ltung ba dpag tu ma mchis pa byung la /
analyzed: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun @173b lhag ma'i ltung ba dpag tu ma mchis pa byung la /
translated: I, the fully ordained monk named so-and-so, have incurred an incalculable number of saṅgha schism offenses arising from such-and-such.

original: zla ba phyed dang dpag tu ma mchis par bcabs pas /
analyzed: zla ba phyed dang dpag tu ma mchis par bcabs pas /
translated: I have concealed them for half a month and an incalculable time.

original: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba dpag tu ma mchis pa byung la zla ba phyed dam dpag tu ma mchis pa bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun las zla ba phyed dam dag pa'i
analyzed: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba dpag tu ma mchis pa byung la zla ba phyed dam dpag tu ma mchis pa bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun las zla ba phyed dam dag pa'i
translated: I, the fully ordained monk named so-and-so, have incurred an incalculable number of partial defeats of the fully ordained monk that are to be specifically confessed and that have arisen from a source of conflict and have concealed them for half a month or an incalculable length of time. For that reason, I request half a month or a period of purification from the saṅgha.

original: mtha' can zla ba bzhi spo ba gsol na zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: mtha' can zla ba bzhi spo ba gsol na zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: I, the fully ordained monk named so-and-so, have incurred an immeasurable number of partial defeats of the saṅgha that occurred in such-and-such a place. I have concealed them for half a month or for an immeasurable time. For that reason, I request the saṅgha to grant me probation for half a month or for four months, the length of time I have concealed my offenses.

original: de la ltung ba'i grangs nges par mi shes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la ltung ba'i grangs nges par mi shes pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the number of downfalls is not known for certain,

original: dpag tu med pa byung la zhes smos pas ni ltung ba bcabs pa nyung dur mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpag tu med pa byung la zhes smos pas ni ltung ba bcabs pa nyung dur mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the phrase “an immeasurable number” is used, so that the concealed downfalls do not become few in number.

original: bcabs pa'i dus nges par shes pa'i phyir zla ba phyed la sogs pa slob pas ni spo ba zla ba phyed la sogs pa'i dus nyung dur mi 'gyur ro //

translated: In a secluded place, in a hidden place, where it is suitable to engage in sexual activity, if one sits down, the first indeterminate occurs.

original: dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'dod pa byar mi rung bar stan la 'dug pa las ni ma des pa gnyis par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'dod pa byar mi rung bar stan la 'dug pa las ni ma des pa gnyis par 'gyur ro //
translated: In a secluded place, in a hidden place, where it is not suitable to engage in sexual activity, if one sits down, the second indeterminate occurs.

original: 'di gnyis ni gleng gzhi'i dbang gis dge slong gis ma nges pa'i chos 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i gnas su 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bca' ba mdzad par zad kyi /🔽@175b ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa la ni yang na pham par 'gyur /🔽yang na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur /

translated: These two are indeterminate dharmas that the Buddha declared in the nidana, “Monks should not live in such indeterminate dharmas.”

original: yang na ltung byed du 'gyur bar ci rigs par sbyar te /
analyzed: yang na ltung byed du 'gyur bar ci rigs par sbyar te /

original: ltung ba sde lngar gzhag pa la ni ma gtogs so //
analyzed: ltung ba sde lngar gzhag pa la ni ma gtogs so //
translated: except for the five classes of downfalls.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag ma nges pa'i chos gnyis po 'di dag ni zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las 'byung ngo zhes bya bas ni ma nges pa gdon pa 'di'i lung dbog pa bstan to //🔽ma nges pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni gang yin gtol med pas ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag ma nges pa'i chos gnyis po 'di dag ni zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las 'byung ngo zhes bya bas ni ma nges pa gdon pa 'di'i lung dbog pa bstan to // ma nges pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni gang yin gtol med pas ma nges pa'o //
translated: “Venerable ones, these two indeterminate dharmas occur in the pratimoksa sutra that is recited every half month.” This shows the recitation of the indeterminate dharmas.🔽Indeterminate dharmas are so called because it is not known what they are.

original: de nyid kha na ma tho ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas chos zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kha na ma tho ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas chos zhes bya'o //
translated: They are called dharmas because they bear the characteristics of offenses.

original: gnyis po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni pham par 'gyur ba dang ; dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed kyi chos gsum las gang yin ma nges pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang ltung byed kyi chos gnyis las gang yin ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni pham par 'gyur ba dang ; dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed kyi chos gsum las gang yin ma nges pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang ltung byed kyi chos gnyis las gang yin ma nges pa'o //
translated: These two are the undetermined offenses among the three classes of offenses: the defeating offenses, the partially defeating offenses, and the downfalls requiring confession alone; and the undetermined offenses among the two classes of offenses: the partially defeating offenses and the downfalls requiring confession alone.🔽They are mentioned in the recitation of the Prātimokṣa every half month.

original: zla ba phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni sde snod gsum las 'dul ba'i sde snod ni yi ger mi 'dri ba yin pas thams cad kyi mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i phyir gso sbyong 'don pas ma nes pa
analyzed: zla ba phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni sde snod gsum las 'dul ba'i sde snod ni yi ger mi 'dri ba yin pas thams cad kyi mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i phyir gso sbyong 'don pas ma nes pa
translated: Since the scriptural collection of the Vinaya is not written down, it is not directly accessible to everyone. Therefore, the undetermined offenses are mentioned in the recitation of the purification of the community.

original: gdon pa 'di ga las shes snyam pa la zla ba phyed phyed cing gso sbyong 'don pa'i tshe 'dul pa 'dzin pa'i kha ton las 'byung ngo zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gdon pa 'di ga las shes snyam pa la zla ba phyed phyed cing gso sbyong 'don pa'i tshe 'dul pa 'dzin pa'i kha ton las 'byung ngo zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: From where do we know this? It is taught that they are mentioned in the recitation of the Vinaya holders every half month during the recitation of the purification of the community.

original: de ltar 'dul ba'i sde snod yang dag par bsdus pa'i gzhung 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dbang po rtul po tshig dang don gyi bdag nyid 'dzin mi nus pa rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par bsdu bar gnang ba yin
analyzed: de ltar 'dul ba'i sde snod yang dag par bsdus pa'i gzhung 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dbang po rtul po tshig dang don gyi bdag nyid 'dzin mi nus pa rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par bsdu bar gnang ba yin
translated: This scripture that correctly compiles the Vinaya Piṭaka was authorized by the Bhagavān to be compiled in order to benefit future beings of dull faculties who are unable to retain the words and their meanings.

original: te / de bas na 'dul ba'i sde snod kyi las gsang ba 'di ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis thos par mi bya'o zhes sngar bstan pa bzhin 'dir yang sbyar ro //

translated: Therefore, this secret activity of the Vinaya Piṭaka should not be heard by those who have not completed the novitiate.

original: de lam nges pa'i chos dang po'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma nyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //

translated: The nidāna of the first Dharma of the path of certainty: The Bhagavān Buddha was dwelling in Śrāvastī, in the Jeta Grove, in the park of Anāthapiṇḍada.

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /

analyzed: khyim bdag gi chung ma sped mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ste /

original: btsun pa 'char ka byon pa legs so //
analyzed: btsun pa 'char ka byon pa legs so //

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de la chos snyan pa snyan pa dag bstan par brtsams so //

analyzed: kye ma 'phags pa 'char ka skad kyi gdangs kyis khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma la sprang bu sbrad rtsi 'byin pa dang 'dra bar chos snyan pa snyan pa dag ston par byed kyi bdag kyang gzhan la brtsams pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir der 'gro'o snyam mo

original: // de nas ri dags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma'i khyim ga la ba der song ba dang / ri dags 'dzin gyi ma sa gas khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i pus mo gnyis la pus mo gnyis gtad de /
analyzed: // de nas ri dags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma'i khyim ga la ba der song ba dang / ri dags 'dzin gyi ma sa gas khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i pus mo gnyis la pus mo gnyis gtad de /
translated: The householder’s wife Saṅghā, the mother of Mṛgāra, saw the householder’s wife Saṃbhavā sitting with her two knees drawn up to her chest,

analyzed: chos ma nyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo //

analyzed: mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te /

analyzed: 'phags pa 'char ka 'dis khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma dang lhan cig dben pa skyabs yod par dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa sdig pa'i las cung zhig byas sam byed par sems so snyam du gdon mi za bar mthar thug par 'gro bar 'gyur bas

analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni bdag gi bya ba yin no snyam nas /

analyzed: de nas ri dags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
translated: Then Sāgara, the mother of Mṛgāra, went to the Blessed One. Having arrived, she bowed her head at the Blessed One’s two feet

analyzed: btsun pa de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du gang gis 'phags pa dag bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang dben pa skyabs mchis pa na stan la mchis par mi 'gyur bar 'phags pa rnams la dran par bgyi ba

translated: “Therefore, monks, you should recite this rule for training:🔽‘If a monk sits alone with a woman in private on a concealed seat suitable for action,🔽and a trustworthy female lay disciple who has seen them accuses him of having committed one of three things—

translated: “If a lay vow-holder who is trustworthy” means
